masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Your grandmother is stuck in traffic 100 miles away. The highway is completely stoppedâ€”some kind of accident. She's going to miss Christmas dinner. She's been making pie for a week. You don't happen to know anyone who could, I don't know, FLY her here? Just spitballing."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Get grandma to dinner without exposing yourself
  • Maybe there's a mundane solution?
  • If you use powers, don't let dad see
